name: Gnoni 2020
overview: A second part of Gnoni, a game that Juan Pablo Cassain published in MicroHobby magazine number 183 in 1987. For this sequel, Azimov has decided to turn the original platform arcade into an open map game, where we must move in search of the necessary elements to repair our UFO. If we compare them side by side, the graphic similarity will undoubtedly draw attention, but there are also many nods to the original game and sections of the map where the platform mechanics are returned.
